divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS WORKING ON MY 98 LINCOLN NAVIGATOR.I NEEDED SOME TOOLS,SO I WALKED TO OUR SHED THAT WAS 20-30 FEET AWAY.AS I WAS LOOKING FOR THE TOOLS MY MOM&MOM'S BOYFRIEND SAID MARIO COME TO SEE THOSE LIGHTS YOU LIKE TO SEE SO MUCH.I SAID WHAT LIGHTS WAIT TILL IM DONE,BY THEN BOTH OF THEM WERE VERY EXITED,SO I WALKED OVER TO THEM & SAW TOWARDS THE MOUNTAINS & WITNESSED A ONCE IN A LIFE TIME EXPERIENCE.(I WOULD LIKE TO BE JOIN YOU PEOPLE ON YOUR NEXT GATHERING,TO EXPLAIN MY KNOLEDGE AND WHAT I KNOW THAT TO THIS DATE NOBODY HAS SEEN IT OR TALKED ABOUT IT THE WAY KNOW IT).THANK YOU.
